茓字的基本解释

茓
xué
做囤用的狭而长的席称“茓子”。通常是用秫秸或芦苇的篾儿编成的。亦作“踅子”。
用茓子围起来囤粮食。

茓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xué］
(1)见“茓子”。
(2)用茓子围起来囤粮食。

Basic explanation of words
Fu
xué
The long and narrow seat used for storage is called "茓子". It is usually made of straw or reed sticks. Also known as "Zizi".
Enclose the food with bilberries.
Fu

(2) Enclose the food with tessels.
